item.title: Pod
item.description: A pod is the smallest object you can create in kubernetes. It is the single instance of application Kubernetes uses yaml file as input. A kubernetes definition file always contains apiVersion, kind, metadata and spec apiVersion: Based on what we trying to creation, apiVersion will vary kind: Type of object which we trying to create metadata: Data about object spec: Specification of object. Details about container to create Create the pod definition file say pod.
